name: Seed of Evil
description:
Seed of Evil is an epic adventure to uncover the secrets of the Water City, Somonden. Follow Anna as she explores the upper and lower parts of the city to uncover the truth of the pollution plaguing its inhabitants. Enjoy this amazing story filled with mystery, drama, and intrigue. It'll be one you won't soon forget.

Make sure you check out this RPG brought to you in native English!

Features
  • Over 30 Unique CG with multiple variations
  • Over 30 Unique Scenes
  • Corruption System
  • Immersive Characters and Story
  • Steam Achievements
